title: Space Shooter Sound Bundle
description: Sound Bundle containing a complete range of sounds for your Space Shooter Game, from looping music to sound FX
longDescription:
Preview the Music Tracks

Preview the Sound Effects

Included files list


This Space Shooter Sound Bundle by Whizzkid Productions is the perfect sound package for your Sci-Fi Space Shooter Game Projects. It contains 120 Sound FX ranging from powerful space weapon sounds, shield impacts and comet trails as well as 5 musical jingles for e.g. completed objectives and such, a looping menu music track and 3 battle themes including an intro and 3 tension levels each.

This is the perfect audio starting point for Game Developers who want to kick off their Space Shooter Game.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 3 Looping Battle Themes, consisting of 1 intro file and 3 tension files each
  • 5 Match Jingles: Match Lost/Won, Objective Complete long/short, Generic Buff
  • Looping Menu Music
  • 4 Ambient Loops: Comet Trails 1/2, EM Nebula Static, Grav Nebula Static
  • 7 Explosions, ranging from large to small, also Subsystem Explosions
  • Â 26 Impact Sounds: Shield Impacts, Enemy and Player Impacts for the various projectiles and weapon types
  • 5 UI Sounds: Button Click/Mouseover, Credit Gain, Menu Button Click, Research Node Purchase
  • 22 Utility Sounds: For example Divert Shield Energy, Hasty Repairs, Intrusion Software, Overcharging, Reinforce Shields, Scavenge
  • 38 Weapon Sounds, ranging from Breaker Cannons and EM Darts, over Laser Guns and Plasma Cannons to Radioactive Waves and Starburst Emitters, to name a few


Number of Audio Waves: 120

Number of Audio Cues: 120

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit/44.1k WAV

Do Sound FX loop: Yes


Full list of contents can be found here.

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Tightened up the Menu Music Track
